payout_example.text1: If the price of {{currency}} drops below {{currencyUSD}} {{triggerThreshold}} and does not recover above {{recoveryThreshold}} within {{recoveryWindowHours}} hours, you will receive a payout in {{currency2}}. The payout is based on the price of {{currency}} after 24 hours and will cover your loss at that time (<0>follow this link for the current price</0>).
